events.name: Debate Tournament
events.description:
Felicity debate tournament
Contact:8800612357

events.name: Zest
events.description:
A virtual Inter-college dance competition that welcomes various dance forms. Dancers can participate in Western solo, Indian classical solo, and group dance categories. Emout experienced judges - Ms. Raveena Choudhary and Mr. S Jayachandran will give feedback for all submissions. 
Contact:7406346663

events.name: The Wall
events.description:
Wall murals have always been an integral part of Felicity. We weren’t going to let a pandemic take that away.

We present to you The Wall, an empty canvas of 250,000 pixels that all of IIIT comes together to colour with what they believe in, stand for or love, one pixel at a time.

Everything you see on the wall is a result of spontaneity and collaboration between people separated by geographies but united by ideas and by their belongingness to the IIIT campus.
Contact:nan

events.name: Game Jam
events.organizer_names: Mayank Goel, Tanishq Chaudhary, Ritvik Kalra
events.description:
Games are fun, whether you make them or play them. Join us at the two-parter Game Jam, made specially for IIIT students to have fun with. The theme is "Back to IIIT", and till 25th February 2355, you can make your game which will be played by everyone. You can spend as little as 20 minutes and still win, or make something epic with your time. The second part is where you play the games which will be put on the Felicity website, and we will have prizes for high scorers in select games.

If you have any issues with Scratch, you can contact us for alternative dev tools. However remember, it's not the programming language but the programmer, who makes the code. Submit your link in the registration below.

events.name: Trinetra
events.description:
IIIT Annual Photography Contest
Contact:nan

events.name: Roast Play - Finals
events.description:
RoastPlay is an epic tournament where you and your teammate will be role-playing as fictional characters roasting and savouring your opponents' pain, who will also be role-playing as fictional characters. Join us for a battle of wits against characters from your favourite universes.

After a very interesting prelims round, 6 teams have qualified for the further rounds. Witness their brutal roasts today in RoastPlay Finals!

events.name: Attack on Frames
events.description:
Workshops:

There will be 2 tutorials introducing the softwares- Adobe Animate and Adobe Audition.

These softwares are required to be installed on your Windows OS for the respective contest followed by the workshops. 

Find the links for the softwares in the below Github repository:
https://github.com/ig-msdian/attack-on-frames

No prior knowledge about the softwares is required. You will be taught the basics of both the softwares.

 Each workshop will be held for around 1hr-1hr 15mins based on the presenter. There will be a break of 15mins between these workshops.

Contest:

The contest shall start as soon as the workshops end and will continue till the end of February.

The theme for the contest is Save the Fest on which you are expected to create a storyline and make an Animation video not more than 2mins with your own SFX added to it.

This time the participants can form teams of up to 3 members and the form for which will be released during the commencement of the workshops.

 The top 3 videos would be posted on our socials and the winners would be given prizes worth Rs 7000/-

The prize distribution and the prizes shall be announced later as the event progresses.


Contact:8328394347

events.name: Footbids
events.description:
The event is divided into 2 stages- Auctioning and Simulation. We will be auctioning off your favorite football players for the first stage followed by a UCL styled simulation FIFA to crown the winner.
Contact:8218002256

events.name: Botomania
events.organizer_names: ishaan, rahul, sriram, swetha, freyam, yoogottam, arpan
events.description:
Cant beat people at games? Why not build a bot to do it for you! A board game is given for which the participants have to write bots which play the game. These bots will battle it out in a tournament which streamed live!

Join us at discord: https://discord.gg/bJJWgjSC


Contact:8160704470

events.name: Treasure Hunt
events.description:
“When the world is threatened by powers vile, we need those who will go that extra mile.” So hone your deducing skills, for you and your teammates must uncover The Secret concealed in our college websites and save the world. Remember: When you have eliminated the impossible, whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth.
Upto 4 members can register as team (You can register for the event with less than 4 people as well). 
Note: We are allowing people from outside IIIT-H to participate but at least one member in the team must have access to IIIT-H credentials to access few of the websites.
Contact: 9475010848

events.name: Space Escapade
events.description:
The cosmos sure are wild and untamed. Do you, brave explorer, have what it takes to be a part of this journey filled with mystery and excitement? Can you escape danger involving moon bases and exoplanets?

The Astronomy Club of IIIT Hyderabad along with Felicity'21 presents Space Escapade! The first ever online mystery room challenge of our campus with exciting prizes! Gather together in teams of two as pairs and battle it out to reach the end in time before it is too late. See you on the 25th of February at 1PM.

Top three teams to complete the challenge on time get to take away prizes worth Rs.4500!
Dear space traveller, can you muster the guts to accept this mission?
Contact:8074474100

events.name: Paint Workshop
events.description:
Watercolours are one of the oldest media man has used to express his mind, when words fell short.

Join us for a watercolouring workshop by the very talented indian_sky_scrapers (Mr Deepak Sharma). Mr Deepak is an immensely popular watercolour artist on Instagram, and specialises in painting organic landscapes.

In this workshop, Mr Deepak will cover watercolours from the absolute basics, covering both the skills of planning the scene as well as the techniques of using the medium.

Open to all school and college students, registration free but mandatory. Register now!
Contact:9711267621

events.name: ML Battleground
events.organizer_names: kanish, animesh, avani, yoogottam, gurkirat, shrey
events.description:
A Machine Learning contest where you compete on AICrowd to solve interesting problems and win prizes.
Contact:6239854647

events.name: Improvise
events.description:
Teams of 4 will do any improv skit on restrictions given by the judges
Contact:7890545454

events.name: Triathlon 1: Valorant
events.description:
Welcome to Triathlon, The Gaming Club's one of a kind event for Felicity 2021!
We're conducting three tournaments over three days,
Day one: Brawlhalla, teams of 3
Day two: Valorant Escalation, teams of 5
Day three: Minecraft Hunger Games, teams of 3.

Winning team of each day get's a 2K INR prize and the top three team's members earn points. The top three **Individuals** with the most points are awarded 2K INR for 1st, 1.5K INR for 2nd and 500 INR for 3rd.

contact: 77998 06577, 7898874977
discord server: https://discord.gg/neA53QJrW3
Enter your team name below

events.name: Desh - Videsh Quiz
events.description:
Test out your knowledge of Indian and International heritage, culture and languages in the gripping Desh - विदेश Quiz brought to you by The Language Club and The TV room quiz club!
Contact:9662498919

events.name: Bit Hunting
events.description:
Welcome to the world of Digital Hunting where you test your thinking capacity
and speed? Here we have interactive questions in Logic and Hardware with
knowledge from Computer Science and Electronics. Let’s see who finds the
Final Flag fist!!
Contact:9711067303

events.name: Mic Drop
events.description:
Recite a story, poetry, haiku or display any other similar oratory talent you possess. You’re also welcome to watch your friends perform. Enjoy this chill-night in the Mic-Drop event. 
Contact:8779598518

events.name: Battle of Brains
events.description:
The TV Room Quiz Club is back with the annual flagship event at Felicity 2021!
This time, we have a renowned quizmaster- Major Chandrakant Nair (twitter: @reduvid) hosting the general quiz online. After serving in the Indian Army for 7 years, he left as a Major. He did all this while Majoring as an avid quizzer as well for the last 25 years by winning many quizzes and conducting over 700 quizzes in various colleges all over India himself!
This is an open quiz with free Registrations, so team up with a friend and register
Contact: Mukund Choudhary, +91 91318 73814

events.name: Vim Golf
events.description:
Vim works best with minimal keystrokes. We'll give you a text input, use your vim-fu and get the required output at the speed of light!
Contact:nan

events.name: Lit Quiz
events.description: What was Tony Stark’s first suit called? Hououin elizabethmarch Kyouma? So you think you know the correct answer? Test your ”pop-sense“ against others at LitQuiz, Felicity ’21. But remember - when you play the Game of Probes, you win or you die. There is no middle ground.

events.name: AMBUSH
events.description:
As you might have seen news of drones coming from our neighbouring countries; some
were shot down by the BSF, also there was an anti drone system deployed in Red Fort
also. Taking inspiration from that we are bringing an event 'Ambush'.
Contact:9711067303

events.name: Codecraft
events.organizer_names: gaurang, dixit, animesh, nikhil, shashwat goel, kunwar, kanish, tanish, amul
events.description:
Our traditional competitive coding contest that people know and love from India and abroad.
Contact:8160704470

events.name: BreakIn
events.description: Find flags hidden in a system/file/message before others do.

events.name: Decode
events.organizer_names: Gaurang, Kunwar, Amul, Kunal, Kishore, Vidit
events.description:
Tired of writing AC solutions? We've got you covered! This contest turns the usual format on its head. You'll be given problems and their buggy code submissions. Your job will be to figure out a test case where the buggy solution fails. 

There's a good mix of logically enthralling bugs, and bugs that make you go "Dude just how? :O", so you'll have tons of entertainment throughout the contest.

For the full list of rules of prizes: visit https://www.codechef.com/DGTC2021.

Contact: gaurang.tandon@students.iiit.ac.in (Gaurang)
events.tagline: Can you hack a well-written buggy solution?

events.name: Fool's coding
events.organizer_names: Tanish, Amul, Alapan, Vasu, Rutvij, Aakash, Srijan
events.description:
Love the thrills of a programming contest but bored by the monotonous pattern of normal contests. Have a knack for finding clues and thinking laterally, we are proud to present Fool’s Programming 2021 as a part of Threads, Felicity IIIT Hyderabad.

The problems can not only have unusual solutions, but will also have bizarre problem statements that can make one scratch their brains. Deciphering the questions will be more challenging than solving them. You'll need eagle eyes to spot the clues and hints hidden in the questions posed to you. Hope you can think on the same plane as the setters ;)
Contact:8160704470

events.name: Googlit
events.description: A quiz where you can google and answer the questions in 24hrs - All the quiz questions will be released at once on 24th Feb 9:00 AM and close  25th Feb 9:00 AM. - Submit your answers at your own pace on forms (to be released) - It is a solo event, a little external help is acceptable.

events.name: Zakir Khan
events.description: Apne ko life mein chahiye  r̶e̶s̶p̶e̶c̶t̶ Zakir Bhai!  Felicity'21 presents to you the very humourous, the very talented Zakir Khan who will be performing on 27th February as a part of our closing ceremony this year!  We are on Cloud Nine as we announce him as a part of our festival! Kyuki badal bahut important hain.

events.name: Rahul Dua
events.description: Rahul Dua is one of the brightest young comics in the country today! Combining small-time charm with big city disillusionment, Rahul's comedy is as funny as it is relevant. And with a beard to match, Dua is a man on a mission with having done 100+ shows across the country garnering 1M+ live viewership. Post Comicstaan, he toured extensively across the country, doing 22 shows

events.name: Jagruti - Anand Rathi
events.description: He is a  2008 CSE graduate from IIIT-H and is an engineer-turned-hedge fund manager-turned-self taught shutterbug. He is the founder of  Reels and Frames, which is one of India’s top documentary photography and film companies and has received 5 Lifetime Fearless Awards for his astounding photographs.  Jagruti which translates to "the Awakening" is an online talk show being held as part of Felicity Several influential personalities that we look up to will be sharing their stories and having a live interactive session exclusively with us!

events.name: Jagruti - V.C. Sajjanar
events.description: Vishwanath C. Sajjanar is the Commissioner of Police for Cyberabad, who started his journey as an IPS as the SP of Jangaon. With his focus on women and child safety issues, Sajjanar is hailed as a hero by the masses. He is also known for his strong focus on community and citizen friendly policing to put an end to cybercrime and human trafficking.   Jagruti which translates to "the Awakening" is an online talk show being held as part of Felicity. Several influential personalities that we look up to will be sharing their stories and having a live interactive session exclusively with us!

events.name: Jagruti - William Bryant
events.description: Will is the Commercial VP at Fresha and parallelly provides Consultancy and Coaching and acts as an Advisor & Non-Executive Director on various startup boards. Will acted as Head of Operations at American Express and was later promoted to Director, Global Platform Solutions, American Express.   Jagruti which translates to "the Awakening" is an online talk show being held as part of Felicity. Several influential personalities that we look up to will be sharing their stories and having a live interactive session exclusively with us!

events.name: Jagruti - Manasi Joshi
events.description: She is a star-para badminton player ranking no.2 in females singles and is the current world champion. She was listed as the Next Generation Leader 2020 by TIME Magazine in October 2020 and she appeared on their Asia cover as well. In 2020 she was featured in BBC 100 Women and Forbes India, Self-made Women of 2020. She is currently preparing to qualify in para badminton at the Tokyo 2020 Paralympics.   Jagruti which translates to "the Awakening" is an online talk show being held as part of Felicity. Several influential personalities that we look up to will be sharing their stories and having a live interactive session exclusively with us!

events.name: Jagruti - Chaitanya Peddi
events.description: He is the co-founder and product head at Darwinbox. Darwinbox has raised $15 Mn funding led by Salesforce Ventures. In the past, he worked as a consultant at Ernst & Young in their Business Advisory Services division. He completed his M.B.A. from Xavier school of management in Jamshedpur and engineering from JNTU college of engineering in Hyderabad.   Jagruti which translates to "the Awakening" is an online talk show being held as part of Felicity. Several influential personalities that we look up to will be sharing their stories and having a live interactive session exclusively with us!

events.name: hsi webinar
events.description: HSI

events.name: Sigu Joseph
events.description: We are proud to announce Mr. Sigu Joseph as a part of Felicity'21! He will be delivering a talk on the topic "Imaging Technology Trends on Mobile Platforms" on 25th Feb 2021 at 4:45 PM.  Joining link: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/89935694154  Sigu Joseph is the Principal Engineer Manager and Mobile Camera Architect @Qualcomm. He is responsible for bridging Camera Systems, Hardware and SW team which involves multiple sub teams like performance power, modelling team etc.  Sigu also leads the WindowsOnSnapdragon Camera Team at Hyderabad, Bangalore. He has played a pivotal role in the establishing Windows on Snapdragon Camera team, demonstrating relentless passion for execution, innovation, and great partnership with global stake holders.  He has over 18 years of experience in Multimedia Imaging industry & has played various leadership and management roles. Sigu holds an M Tech degree in Digital Electronics and Advanced Communication.  We are honoured to have him as a part of our fest!  #Felicity2021 #Qualcomm #Technology #cameras #imaging #snapdragon #innovation #iiit #hyderabad #Felicity #iiith

events.name: Inaugrals
events.description: The wait is now over, Felicity Day 1 is finally here!  We'll begin the day with IIITH's own inaugural dance performances, followed by a stand-up act of the most awaited Rahul Dua! Then the inaugural dances will continue for a little longer and we'll end the evening on a high note with the performance of Aakash Gupta!  What are you waiting for? Register now: https://us02web.zoom.us/meeting/register/tZMtc-yqrD0qGNLtpGWAMEbUkzSrnFj6UcTZ  After registering, you will receive a confirmation email containing information about joining the meeting. Those who have already registered on the Felicity website need to register again on this link.  The inaugurals begin at 7:00. Kindly note that you need to register from your IIITH email, and join the room 30 minutes in advance, otherwise we can't guarantee your admission into the meet. And please do not ping anyone from the team if you try to join after the event has commenced, as we have to attend the events as well.  Awaiting your participation at Felicity '21!
